original: 2.3.4. Paccuppannātītavāra🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānāti so vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānāti saḥ vedanā kkhandham parijānittha ati no
translated: ... The section on the present and past🔽Has anyone who fully understands the form aggregate also fully understood the feeling aggregate? No.

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānittha so rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham parijānittha saḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānāti iti no
translated: Or has anyone who has fully understood the feeling aggregate also fully understood the form aggregate? No.

original: Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānāti so vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānitthāti?🔽Arahā rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānāti, no ca vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca
analyzed: yaḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānāti saḥ vedanā kkhandham na parijānittha ati  arahā rūpa kkhandham na parijānāti no ca vedanā kkhandham na agga magga samaṅgin ca
translated: Has anyone who has not fully understood the form aggregate not fully understood the feeling aggregate?🔽A perfected being has not fully understood the form aggregate, but has not not fully understood the feeling aggregate.

original: arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā rūpakkhandhañca na parijānanti vedanākkhandhañca na parijānittha.
analyzed: arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalāḥ rūpa kkhandhañca na parijānanti vedanā kkhandhañca na parijānittha
translated: Except for the one on the path to the first path and the perfected being, the rest have not fully understood both the form aggregate and the feeling aggregate.

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānittha so rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham na parijānittha saḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānāti iti
translated: Or has anyone who has not fully understood the feeling aggregate not fully understood the form aggregate?

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānittha, no ca rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānāti.
analyzed: agga magga samaṅgī vedanā kkhandham na parijānittha no ca rūpa kkhandham na parijānāti
translated: One on the path to the first path has not fully understood the feeling aggregate, but has not not fully understood the form aggregate.

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā vedanākkhandhañca na parijānittha
analyzed: agga magga samaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesāḥ puggalāḥ vedanā kkhandhañca na parijānittha
translated: Except for those who are on the path to the highest fruit and the Arahants, the rest of the persons have not fully understood the feeling-aggregate.
They have not fully understood the form-aggregate.
